alert.note: Alert for Eastern Cochise County Below 5000 Feet including Douglas, Willcox; Upper Gila River and Aravaipa Valleys including Clifton, Safford (Arizona) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued August 04 at 12:16AM MST by NWS Tucson
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of southeastern Graham, northeastern Cochise and southeastern Greenlee Counties through 115 AM MST... At 1215 AM MST, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm 17 miles southwest of Virden, moving northwest at 10 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 50 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Duncan and Franklin. This includes the following highways... Route 70 between mile markers 369 and 385. Route 75 between mile markers 379 and 385. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.

area.areaDesc: Eastern Cochise County Below 5000 Feet including Douglas, Willcox; Upper Gila River and Aravaipa Valleys including Clifton, Safford
